user_total_trades_before.description: Count of user trades prior to this trade.

user_total_volume_before.description: Lifetime total abs(usdc_size) before this trade.

user_days_active_before.description: Unique days on which the user traded.

user_avg_size_before.description: Mean absolute size of user trades (Welford).

user_historical_pnl_before.description: Sum of edges for markets already closed.

user_recent_pnl_last20.description: Sum of user’s last 20 realized edges (closed markets only).

time_since_user_last_trade.description: ts - user.last_ts, or -1 if first trade.

market_total_trades_before.description: Total trades in market up to this point.

market_total_volume_before.description: Lifetime total USDC volume before this trade.

market_volume_last_1h.description: Sum of abs(usdc_size) of last 1h window.

last_price_yes.description: Most recent YES price before this trade (0 if none).

last_price_no.description: Most recent NO price before this trade (0 if none).

mid_price.description: If last_price_yes exists: last_price_yes; else current YES-prob price.

time_since_last_market_trade.description: ts - market.last_ts, or -1 if no history.

user_usdc_last_1h_in_market.description: User’s volume in this market over last 1h window.

user_trades_last_1h_in_market.description: User’s trade count in this market over last 1h.

user_total_usdc_in_market.description: Lifetime total USDC spent by user in this market before this trade.

user_trade_count_in_market.description: Lifetime trades by this user in this market before this trade.

user_share_of_volume_in_market.description: Lifetime user volume divided by market lifetime volume.

time_since_user_last_trade_in_market.description: ts - last user trade in this market, -1 if none.
